Container.Name: PostgreSQL_Immich-Official
Container.Overview:
This container (based on PostgreSQL 16) is specifically configured for seamless integration with the Immich container, which requires PostgreSQL equipped with pgvecto a robust Postgres extension enabling vector similarity search functions. The specific version used is tensorchord/pgvecto-rs:pg16-v0.2.1
#Note Any change here should be replicated in the Immich container configuration.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work and would like to support me please consider Donating.
Container.Requires: The Immich container and Redis container (or Redis can be enabled with docker mods in Immich container instead of separate Redis)

Config.Name: POSTGRESQL_TCP_PORT
Config.Description: PostgreSQL TCP connection port mapped to 5433 from 5432 in case of other postgres container present
